snippet.title: Quick Salsa Chicken and Rice
snippet.description: Quick Salsa Chicken and Rice featuring flavorful rice and chicken with salsa is a speedy version of a classic Mexican recipe. Packed with delicious flavors, it is ready in 30 minutes.

snippet.title: Salsa Chicken Over Rice
snippet.description: Salsa Chicken Over Rice is a delicious and easy dish featuring strips of chicken breast sauteed with vegetables and sprinkled with cheese. Garnish with sour cream and cilantro.

snippet.title: Chicken Fried Rice
snippet.description: Chicken Fried Rice is a quick and easy one-dish meal. It's delicious and sure to become a family favorite.

snippet.title: Dominican Chicken & Rice
snippet.description: Dominican Chicken & Rice gets its great flavors from sautéed onions, garlic and green peppers combined with spices and a flavorful tomato sauce. This is a great choice for family meals.

snippet.title: Chicken & Rice Casserole
snippet.description: Satisfy hearty appetites with this comforting recipe. Baked to golden brown perfection, this rich and flavorful Chicken and Rice Casserole is one of the most popular meals and is sure to become a family favorite. Prepare in advance and store in the freezer for an easy weeknight dinner.

snippet.title: Maggi Vegetable Rice
snippet.description: This classic and simple vegetable rice dish adds color and flavor to any meal.

snippet.title: Coconut Rice
snippet.description: Coconut Rice is a favorite in many countries. In this Colombian-inspired recipe, coconut milk and lime zest add flavor elements to this easy-to-prepare dish. Often served with fish and seafood, it is also wonderful with spicy foods. Great for any occasion.

snippet.title: Creamy Chicken and Rice Bake
snippet.description: Creamy Chicken and Rice Bake is a quick and hearty meal for your family! Terrific to serve on a hectic day. Ready in just 1 hour.

snippet.title: Apple Ginger Brown Rice
snippet.description: This Apple Ginger Brown Rice recipe is a simple and flavorful side dish that will work well on any holiday table. Unlike white rice, brown rice retains the nutritious bran and germ covering of the rice grain. Read more about this recipe on the Nestlé Kitchens blog .

snippet.title: Chicken and Wild Rice Soup
snippet.description: This home-style Chicken and Wild Rice Soup is light and nourishing and quite easy to make. The rice adds great texture and flavor. Freeze this one to have on hand when you are pressed for time. Top with toasted almonds and thinly sliced green onions to add a final flair.
